name: Denial Network
description:
A simulation game about information wars, made for Climate Jam 2022.

Play as a group of activist to fight against the misinformation on climate change, find out who is pulling the strings behind the curtains and end their propaganda.

Input:

  • Mouse
  • Alt+F4 for quitting

How to play:

  • Drag & drop some shapes
  • Click some buttons

Assets:

  • Images from pixabay.com

Source code:

  • https://github.com/sapsari/dismis
